Description:
Detects the use of Ditsnap tool, an inspection tool for Active Directory database, ntds.dit.

Author: Furkan Caliskan (@caliskanfurkan_)
Sigma Repository: [GitHub](https://github.com/SigmaHQ/sigma)
Name: PUA - DIT Snapshot Viewer
Query: sourcetype='windows-sysmon' eql select * from _source_ where process_path like '%\ditsnap.exe' and command like '%ditsnap.exe%'
